knimeNode.name: XLS Microbial Data Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Loads microbial data from an Excel spreadsheet file

fullDescription.intro: Loads laboratory test data from a Microsoft Excel file, stored for example as bacterial cell counts over time for a specific test organism in a matrix with defined test conditions concerning temperature (temp), pH value (ph) and water activity (aw).
fullDescription.option: Load data from an XLS file. The column order in the file should be "ID", "AgentName", "MatrixName", "Comment", "Temperature", "pH", "aw", "Time" and "LogC". Please note that for a successful XLS import every data set needs an ID.

Define units for time (seconds to weeks), concentration (log10 cell count, ln cell count or cell count) and temperature (°C or °F). The values will automatically be converted to the units used internally by PMM-Lab: Time [h], conc [log10 cfu/g], temperature [°C].
